client_id: INSERT HERE CLIENT ID OF YOUR AZURE SPN
client_secret: INSERT HERE CLIENT SECRET OF YOUR AZURE SPN
subscription_id: INSERT HERE YOUR AZURE SUBSCRIPTION ID
object_id: INSERT HERE OBJECT ID OF YOUR AZURE SPN
tenant_id: INSERT HERE YOUR AZURE ACTIVE DIRECTORY ID
resource_group_name: INSERT HERE THE RESSOURCE GROUP NAME WHERE IMAGE BUILT WILL BE STORED
tag_creator: INSERT HERE CREATOR OF THIS IMAGE
tag_usage: INSERT HERE THE PURPOSE OF THIS IMAGE
azure_region: INSERT HERE THE NAME OF AZURE REGION
vm_image_name: INSERT HERE THE NAME OF BUILT VM IMAGE
vm_size_for_building: INSERT HERE THE SIZE OF VM USED BY PACKER TO BUILD IMAGE
